markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Winter Cat Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=2317) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Winter Catfolk](/Heritages.aspx?ID=62) heritage

</column>

---

Your eyes are keen and accustomed to winter conditions. You ignore [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) caused by ice and snow.
name: Winter Cat Senses
